LanguageData.VFEM_RallyWearerHediff.label: rally
LanguageData.VFEM_RallyWearerHediff.description: Aura that rallies everyone nearby, stopping their mental breaks and preventing them from breaking again.
LanguageData.VFEM_RallyAuraBuffHediff.label: rally aura
LanguageData.VFEM_RallyAuraBuffHediff.description: Rallying aura that prevents mental breaks.
